features: Stretchy Hair Poppy takes "hair play" to a different, innovated level!
Poppy from DreamWorks Trolls Band Together now has the most amazing super stretchy and squishy hair that's so much fun to play with!
Collect all 3! Stretchy Hair Poppy, Stretchy Hair Viva and Stretchy Hair Branch!
Kids can stretch Poppy's hair up to 3 times its size!
Poppy's hair goes back to its original size and style when you let go!
Each doll has a glittery filling inside their goo-filled hair.
body.description: You've never seen Trolls dolls like these before! Poppy from DreamWorks Trolls Band Together now has the most amazing super stretchy and squishy, pink hair that kids will love to play with! From the makers of Goo Jit Zu, this Trolls doll takes hair play to a new innovative level with the most tactile hair ever! Stretchy Hair Poppy has a glittery filling inside her goo-filled hair. Kids can hold Poppy and stretch her hair up to an amazing 3 times its size! Squish and stretch this cute and colorful Troll and watch as her hair returns to its original shape and style. Also available is Stretchy Hair Branch and Stretchy Hair Viva. Children and adults alike will love collecting all three Stretch Hair Trolls dolls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazing Hair Play! These amazing Stretchy Hair Trolls Dolls takes "hair play" to a different, innovated level! There's no brush required here! The awesome goo-filled hair can be made longer by just grabbing the hair and stretching! Stretchy Hair Trolls Dolls are so tactile and fun to play with!

Collect Them All! There are 3 different Trolls Dolls with stretchy, squishy hair for kids to collect. Poppy, Viva and Branch from DreamWorks Trolls Band Together are all available to play with. Each doll has a cool and colorful hairdo that can be stretched and squeezed into different shapes. Kids will love playing in a very different and cool way than usual dolls! Hair That's So Stretchy! Stretchy Hair Trolls Dolls have incredibly stretchy hair. Created by the makers of Goo Jit Zu, their goo-filled hair can be stretched up to 3 times its length! Poppy's hair can stretch up to 13"/32cm. Branch and Viva's hair can stretch up to 18"/48cm. Now that's stretchy! Stretch Again And Again! Each Stretchy Hair Trolls Doll has goo-filled hair that returns to the doll's original shape and style when kids stop stretching. Poppy, Branch and Viva all have amazingly colorful hairstyles that can be squished and stretched again and again! Glitter Up Your Life! Stretchy Hair Trolls Dolls are full of sparkle! Poppy, Branch and Viva all have stretchy hair that's filled with glitter! As kids stretch and squeeze the hair they can see the glitter move around in the goo filling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely yes but it
reviews.reviewText: I purchased both branch and poppy for my children. They have THE CUTEST little faces. I play with them more than my kids do. Mostly because I always have them lol. Super duper durable. They help so much with my anxiety. Wonderful fidget. Now they do get sticky, I’m not gonna lie about that so you can wash them and corn starch them if you want and just make sure you keep them on a clean surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this and didn’t check dimensions. I was expecting a tiny doll but this is a pretty good size (the hair part as least). It’s so satisfying squeezing, squishing and pulling the hair! LOL My girl loved hers! It seems sturdy and the hair goes back to its normal size and stays how you see it! Overall super cool toy and highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great stretch and durability when playing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for little girls
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my niece and she was obsessed with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cute and good for sensory needs. Don't pull too hard on the hair though. My 5 year old pulling on it has managed to lift it around the whole hairline front and back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Christmas gift
reviews.reviewText: My child loved this gift. She has a blast pulling and stretching the hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t pop like the squishy stress balls so I’m happy my kids can stretch it and twist it all they want and not have to worry about a toxic jelly explosion 😂 they love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my Grandaughter, she loves it. The stretch is addictive to play with...
